report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Siemens Desigo products Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Siemens Desigo products Vulnerability
text: Siemens Desigo products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an uncaught exception in the BACnet communication function implementation. By sending a specially-crafted BACnet protocol packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.
